summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the behavior of the LSQR sparse linear solver in the CuPy SciPy compatibility layer, checking its correctness across different matrix formats, dimensions, and edge cases.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability and correctness of the LSQR implementation within CuPy's sparse linear algebra module, ensuring it matches expected SciPy behavior and handles various input scenarios robustly.
